nodes.text: Cairn was an asteroid in the Lenico Belt where the Imperial Remnant Cairn Installation was located in 12 ABY. There, Galak Fyyar's ship the Doomgiver was docked, and Kyle Katarn's partner Jan Ors was being held prisoner on board it. It was also where cortosis was processed for the armor of the Remnant's new shadowtrooper.
